title: Crime Alert 04.25.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.25.19
description:
Man charged with a hate crime after allegedly running over an interracial couple in a New Orleans parking lot. Cold case solved by job application. A fugitive on the run since 2008 - captured in Costa Rica.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
